name: Captain Zorro: The Secret Lab
description: The Earth is in danger again! Evil aliens and insidious robots have built a secret laboratory and are going to create a heavy-duty bomb to smash the Earth into pieces. Only one man can destroy the lab and break the invaders' cunning plan - it's Captain Zorro. Hundreds of traps won't be able to stop a hero armed with deadly blaster and dazzling smile!
